name: Stealth Kart (itch)
description:
In Stealth Kart, GTA2 meets Commandos.

You combine your karts' skills to sneak fast.

https://i.imgur.com/7gWut0l.mp4

  • Racing!
  • Also Stealth!
  • Unlock levels by being very fast or very stealthy.
  • Local Coop! Bring a friend and a controller.

This is the first public alpha. Please tell me your thoughts, or tell me about bugs you found.

https://i.imgur.com/IaT0kwU.mp4

Keep up to date on my twitter @theHalfMule

Feel free to join us on Discord. https://discord.gg/jV3uB5T
